疿字的基本解释

疿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［féi］
［《廣韻》符非切，平微，奉。］
中风，偏瘫。
[②]［fèi］
［《廣韻》扶沸切，去未，奉。］
［《廣韻》蒲罪切，上賄，並。］
亦作“疿1”。
痱子。

疿字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　疿； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页771第34
【廣韻】方味切【集韻】方未切，?音沸。【玉篇】熱生小瘡。【集韻】熱瘍也。【黃帝素問】汗出見濕，乃生痤疿。【正字通】今俗以觸熱膚疹如沸者曰疿子。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Department of Sui Characters] 　痱; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 771 34
[Guangyun] Fang Weiqi [Jiyun] Fang is not cut, sound boiling. [Jade articles] Small sores caused by heat. 【Jiyun】Heat ulcer also. [Huangdisuwen] Sweat and wetness cause acne rash. [Zhengzitong] People who call hot skin rashes like boiling are called prickly heat.
